tldr: The rustls-pemfile crate is no longer maintained. The repository has been archived since August 2025, and users are encouraged to depend directly on the underlying PEM parsing code included in rustls-pki-types since 1.9.0. The latest version of rustls-pemfile is in fact a thin wrapper around the same code used in rustls-pki-types, so migrating should be straightforward.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using this package.
how_to_fix: Remove any `rustls-pemfile` package from your application. Please take a look at `rustls_pki_types` instead.
vulnerable_to: Use of Unmaintained Third Party Components
